titleInfo.title: Applied and Computational Mathematics Division
titleInfo.subTitle: summary of activities for fiscal year 2020

name.namePart: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

originInfo.publisher: U.S. Dept. of Commerce, National Institute of Standards and Technology ;

mods.abstract: This report summarizes recent technical work of the Applied and Computational Sciences Division of the Information Technology Laboratory at the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST). Part I (Overview) provides a high-level overview of the Division's activities, including highlights of technical accomplishments during the previous year. Part II (Features) provides further details on projects of particular note this year. This is followed in Part III (Project Summaries) by brief synopses of all technical projects active during the past year. Part IV (Activity Data) provides listings of publications, technical talks, and other professional activities in which Division staff members have participated. The reporting period covered by this document is October 2019 through December 2020.
mods.note: Title from PDF title page (viewed October 1, 2021).
Approved by the NIST Editorial Review Board on 2021-05-12.
Mode of access: World Wide Web.
Systems requirements: Adobe Acrobat PDF reader.
